name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Girl With Dragon Tattoo Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate your new tab with the striking Girl With Dragon Tattoo live wallpaper!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Featuring a bold design of a girl adorned with a stunning dragon tattoo, this wallpaper brings a mix of power and artistry to your browsing experience. Access your favorite websites with ease using popular shortcuts, and customize your tab by adding your own links. Stay organized with the built-in calendar and clock, and search the web effortlessly through your default search engine.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Admire the captivating Girl With Dragon Tattoo every time you open a new tab.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Instantly access your favorite sites.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Make your new tab unique with personalized links.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Keep track of your schedule with a built-in calendar and clock.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Search the web quickly and easily with your default search engine.
Explore more extensions, view our Privacy Policy, or uninstall with ease via the provided links.
